issue.title: discordbotlist.com
issue.body:
### Issue URL (Anti Adblock Script) [https://discordbotlist.com/bots/tatsu/upvote/aip](https://adguardteam.github.io/AnonymousRedirect/redirect.html?url=https%3A%2F%2Fdiscordbotlist.com%2Fbots%2Ftatsu%2Fupvote%2Faip) ### Comment > Adguard gets detected in this website. Please kindly fix this. ### Screenshots

### System configuration Information | value --- | --- Platform: | Android 12 AdGuard product: | AdGuard for Android v3.6.8 (46) Browser: | Chrome (data compression) AdGuard mode: | VPN Filtering quality: | High-quality HTTPS filtering: | enabled Stealth mode: | disabled DNS filtering: | server: `https://security.cloudflare-dns.com/dns-query`
filters: `https://filters.adtidy.org/android/filters/15_optimized.txt` Filters: | Ad Blocking:

AdGuard Mobile Ads

issue.title: bgm.tv
issue.body:
### Issue URL (Incorrect Blocking) [https://bgm.tv/subject/301369](https://adguardteam.github.io/AnonymousRedirect/redirect.html?url=https%3A%2F%2Fbgm.tv%2Fsubject%2F301369) ### Comment Username: @xmydl520 > こんにちは。こちらにひとつややこしい問題があります。カスタムルール(ユーザーフィルター)がONであろうかOFFであろうか関係せずブロックが機能しません。全部が全部のサイトにて、すべてのユーザーフィルターが機能しません。色々調べたが解決策が見つかりません。ルーターにAdguard Homeが併用しています。今のうちに唯一の打開策はAdguard Blocker(Adguard Assistantではなく)を同時に稼働すること。こちらのユーザーフィルターに同じルールをインポートしたら問題なく機能します。ちなみにChromeで同じサイトを訪ねたらそちらは問題なく(Adguard Blockerがなくても)ブロックされました。ご迷惑をかけてすみません。 > Hello. There is a complication here. Block does not work regardless of whether the custom rule (user filter) is on or off. It does not work on all sites with any user rule. I also have Adguard Home on my router. The only way to solve it at the moment is to run Adguard Blocker (not Adguard Assistant) at the same time. With importing the same rules into the user filter it works fine. By the way, I visited the same site on Chrome and was blocked without any problem (even without Adguard Blocker). ### Screenshots
Screenshot 1 ![Screenshot 1](https://reports-img.adguard.com/ST8B9Gz.png)
Screenshot 2 ![Screenshot 2](https://reports-img.adguard.com/mn7RlFx.png)
### System configuration Information | value --- | --- AdGuard product: | AdGuard for Windows v7.9.1 Browser: | Iridium(a Chromium Browser) AdGuard driver: | WFP Stealth mode options: | Send Do-Not-Track header,
Remove X-Client-Data header from HTTP requests,
Strip URLs from tracking parameters,
Block WebRTC,
Block Push API,
Block Location API,
Hide your User-Agent (Mozilla/5.0 (Windows NT 10.0; Win64; x64) AppleWebKit/537.36 (KHTML, like Gecko) Chrome/101.0.4951.41 Safari/537.36) DNS filtering: | disabled Filters: | Ad Blocking:

comment.body:
> @xmydl520 Hi. What is wrong? Nothing happens when you click that buttons?
> 
> Btw anti-adblock-killer.user.js is obsolete, better disable it.
> 
> Details
> > Adguard Home
> 
> Which upsteam and which blocking lists are used?

Thank you so much! I've now tried to disable AakList in extension js script and it worked correctly.
